title: 2012 BMW 650i xDrive M Sport Coupe
description: This 2012 BMW 650i coupe was initially sold in Illinois and spent time in Ontario, Canada, before returning to the US in 2022. The car is finished in Imola Red over black Nappa leather upholstery and is powered by a twin-turbocharged 4.4-liter V8 mated to an eight-speed automatic transmission that drives all four wheels through an xDrive all-wheel-drive system. It is equipped with the M Sport and Premium Sound packages, Dynamic Damper Control, 20" alloy wheels, adaptive LED headlights, a glass sunroof, heated and ventilated power-adjustable front seats, dual-zone automatic climate control, adaptive cruise control, a head-up display, a rearview camera, navigation, and iDrive infotainment linked to a premium sound system. The seller purchased the car on BaT in March 2023, and service under current ownership included changing the oil and replacing the transfer case, tires, and rear brake rotors and pads. This F13 6-Series Coupe has 60k miles and is offered with manufacturer’s literature, a clean Carfax Report, and a clean Virginia title in the seller's name.
author: bringatrailer
excerpt: Bid for the chance to own a 2012 BMW 650i xDrive M Sport Coupe at auction with Bring a Trailer, the home of the best vintage and classic cars online. Lot #186,261.
text: This 2012 BMW 650i coupe was initially sold in Illinois and spent time in Ontario, Canada, before returning to the US in 2022. The car is finished in Imola Red over black Nappa leather upholstery and is powered by a twin-turbocharged 4.4-liter V8 mated to an eight-speed automatic transmission that drives all four wheels through an xDrive all-wheel-drive system. It is equipped with the M Sport and Premium Sound packages, Dynamic Damper Control, 20″ alloy wheels, adaptive LED headlights, a glass sunroof, heated and ventilated power-adjustable front seats, dual-zone automatic climate control, adaptive cruise control, a head-up display, a rearview camera, navigation, and iDrive infotainment linked to a premium sound system. The seller purchased the car on BaT in March 2023, and service under current ownership included changing the oil and replacing the transfer case, tires, and rear brake rotors and pads. This F13 6-Series Coupe has 60k miles and is offered with manufacturer’s literature, a clean Carfax Report, and a clean Virginia title in the seller’s name. The car is finished in Imola Red (405), and the M Sport Package added M aerodynamic bodywork and LED fog lights. Additional exterior details include adaptive LED headlights, a glass sunroof, front and rear parking sensors, and dual exhaust outlets with black finishers. Scratches are noted on the front bumper cover. The 20″ Style 373M alloy wheels are mounted with Continental ExtremeContact tires manufactured in 2023. The car is equipped with Dynamic Damper Control and Active Roll Stabilization, and stopping power is provided by four-wheel ventilated disc brakes. Work performed under current ownership included flushing the brake fluid and replacing the rear brake rotors and pads. Scuffs are visible on the wheels. The heated and ventilated power-adjustable front seats and contoured rear bench are upholstered in black Nappa leather. Woodgrain trim accents the dashboard, center console, and door panels, and additional appointments include front seat position memory, dual-zone automatic climate control, adaptive cruise control, an Alcantara headliner, a power rear sunshade, a rearview camera, navigation, and iDrive infotainment linked to a premium sound system. The heated M Sport multifunction steering wheel features paddle shifters and frames a 160-mph speedometer, a tachometer, and supplementary gauges. A head-up display projects critical information onto the windshield. The digital odometer indicates 60k miles, approximately 11k of which were added under current ownership. The twin-turbocharged 4.4-liter N63B44 V8 was factory rated at 400 horsepower and 450 lb-ft of torque. The most recent oil change was performed in August 2024. Power is sent to all four wheels through a ZF 8HP eight-speed automatic transmission and a replacement transfer case that was installed in May 2023. html:
This 2012 BMW 650i coupe was initially sold in Illinois and spent time in Ontario, Canada, before returning to the US in 2022. The car is finished in Imola Red over black Nappa leather upholstery and is powered by a twin-turbocharged 4.4-liter V8 mated to an eight-speed automatic transmission that drives all four wheels through an xDrive all-wheel-drive system. It is equipped with the M Sport and Premium Sound packages, Dynamic Damper Control, 20″ alloy wheels, adaptive LED headlights, a glass sunroof, heated and ventilated power-adjustable front seats, dual-zone automatic climate control, adaptive cruise control, a head-up display, a rearview camera, navigation, and iDrive infotainment linked to a premium sound system. The seller purchased the car on BaT in March 2023, and service under current ownership included changing the oil and replacing the transfer case, tires, and rear brake rotors and pads. This F13 6-Series Coupe has 60k miles and is offered with manufacturer’s literature, a clean Carfax Report, and a clean Virginia title in the seller’s name.

The car is finished in Imola Red (405), and the M Sport Package added M aerodynamic bodywork and LED fog lights. Additional exterior details include adaptive LED headlights, a glass sunroof, front and rear parking sensors, and dual exhaust outlets with black finishers. Scratches are noted on the front bumper cover.

The 20″ Style 373M alloy wheels are mounted with Continental ExtremeContact tires manufactured in 2023. The car is equipped with Dynamic Damper Control and Active Roll Stabilization, and stopping power is provided by four-wheel ventilated disc brakes. Work performed under current ownership included flushing the brake fluid and replacing the rear brake rotors and pads. Scuffs are visible on the wheels.

The heated and ventilated power-adjustable front seats and contoured rear bench are upholstered in black Nappa leather. Woodgrain trim accents the dashboard, center console, and door panels, and additional appointments include front seat position memory, dual-zone automatic climate control, adaptive cruise control, an Alcantara headliner, a power rear sunshade, a rearview camera, navigation, and iDrive infotainment linked to a premium sound system.

The heated M Sport multifunction steering wheel features paddle shifters and frames a 160-mph speedometer, a tachometer, and supplementary gauges. A head-up display projects critical information onto the windshield. The digital odometer indicates 60k miles, approximately 11k of which were added under current ownership.

The twin-turbocharged 4.4-liter N63B44 V8 was factory rated at 400 horsepower and 450 lb-ft of torque. The most recent oil change was performed in August 2024.

Power is sent to all four wheels through a ZF 8HP eight-speed automatic transmission and a replacement transfer case that was installed in May 2023.

The Carfax report is free of accidents and other reported damage.
